Message:
Just where did you
run off to, Master?

...Huh? Where am I?
Why am I in the woods...?

And what’s with
the big white fluff here?
I can’t see anything
in front of me.

...? Master!
I knew that was you!
I’m so happy I didn’t get lost!

Listen, listen!
When I ran after you,
I ended up in this strange place...!

But, I’m okay
’cause Master’s here!
Hehehe. You had to come
find me again, huh.

What are you doing here, Master?
Huh? You’re gonna play with me?
Yaaay~! What should we play?
